nodes.name: Important meeting
dialogue: It's a big day for me today. Well, I guess it applies to you now as well! Got a meeting. Can't say I'm looking forward to it, but it is what it is. This place, I know you haven't been here long, but do you think it should just be tossed aside? Ripped apart by the amoral dogs of capitalism?

nodes.name: Cold feet
dialogue: Ah, I see. Not much of a hand-talker, then? Too committed to the job, ha! Well, you'll grow into it.

nodes.name: Ungrateful
dialogue: Pah! That's just like this generation, nothing's sacred to you! You just want the newest, the shiniest thing! You just toss everything else away without a second thought! Not even taking a moment to realize that maybe, maybe something old is something worth keeping! Next thing I know I'll be tossed aside. If I haven't been already.... I'm sorry, I lost my temper there for a bit. It's hard growing old, the world moves on. That's just how it goes. This place, well, it's the last friend I have. Forgive me.

nodes.name: Professional negotiator
dialogue: Hah! Good! Good. You know, this isn't the first time someone's tried to buy this old place. Back in the sixties they tried turning it into a casino. Here, a casino, could you believe that! Of course, that didn't work. Then about ten years back, someone wanted to change the name of the place! To their own, even! I told them I'd die before I saw some pig's name above the door.... That threat's not quite so effective now.

nodes.name: Sour mood
dialogue: Well, just get me to my floor already. I'll be getting enough guff in the meeting, don't need you adding to it.

Why, you ungrateful, miserable cad! You know the only reason I got you this job was because I felt bad for you! Oh, just take me to my floor so we can end this conversation.

nodes.name: Financial burden
dialogue: I know we haven't been doing as well for the last few years, well... the last ten years. But it's survived through worse! It will make it... it has to.
We'll get this place off the ground, I know we will. We've just got to get profits up again. I don't know how, but we will.

nodes.name: Quiet trip
dialogue: Well. That's that then.
Well. That's that then.

nodes.name: End
dialogue: I promise you, I'll defend this place to my dying breath. There's something worth saving here. And it's my duty to protect that.
That businessman is all talk, I'll keep this place. I know I will.
Well, despite what you might thing, I'll protect this place. You may not see why it's worth it, but I do. And others do too.

nodes.name: notFloor
dialogue: This is the wrong floor. Could you take me to floor two, the business floor?
The business floor is floor two. You can look at the lights to tell where that is.
Floor two is the business floor. This is not the business floor. Take me to the business floor.
